features: FIRM MEMORY FOAM PILLOW: Cervical pillow for neck pain relief is made of slow rebound memory foam that supports your head and neck while allowing you to sleep comfortably. Slow rebound high density memory foam, not easy to deform and harden.This neck support pillow provides you with the perfect balance of orthopedic support and softness.

ADJUSTABLE HEIGHTS FOR ANY SLEEPING POSITION: The contour pillow size:23.5x13.4x3.5/4.9 inches (L x W x H). The neck pillow for sleeping is designed with two adjustable heights to support the neck and head in any sleep position such as side sleeper, supine, prone, supine and low pillow sleeper.

BREATHABLE & COOLING: The pillowcase is made of breathable fabric with a soft and smooth texture that prevents wrinkles on your skin, is kind to your skin and hair, and is removable for machine washing. The pillow inner is filled with cooling gels that will give you a cool sleep and prevent you from waking up hot when you fall asleep, allowing you experience a deep sleep all night.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The cooling pillow curve design of the pillow and the slow rebound sponge perfectly fit the contour of every head, neck and shoulder, which can relieve your body pressure, reduce your shoulder, head and neck, back pain, relieve your insomnia, and give you a healthy sleep.

BEST GIFT & WORRY-FREE AFTER-SALES: The cube pillow is suitable for people of all ages, which can help your friends and family members to relieve the pain of insomnia and have a comfortable sleep. body.description: Homemate Memory Foam Pillow - Revolutionize Your Sleep Quality!Are you tired of waking up every morning with neck pain and stiffness? It’s time to let Homemate Memory Foam Pillow give you true comfort and support!This super ergonomic pillow is an innovative sleep product designed to provide personalized support and comfort. Its core material is high-density memory foam, offering excellent shape recovery and a soft touch. Whether you’re lying on your side, back, or stomach, the adult side pillow automatically adjusts to the curve of your head and neck pressure to provide optimal support, reducing cervical pressure and promoting a relaxed and comfortable night’s sleep.Moreover, the neck pillow material helps to relieve painful sleep, with excellent air permeability and moisture absorption. We have injected cooling gel into the pillow core, which can effectively remove excess water and heat, keeping the pillow dry and refreshing, providing you with a healthier sleep environment. The pillowcase of the wave-shaped corrective pillow is made of comfortable and soft fabric, with a detachable and washable design that is easy to clean and maintain.The memory sponge pillow is suitable for people of all ages and sleeping habits, especially those with neck fatigue, headaches, shoulder aches and pains. Whether you are resting at home, in the office, or traveling, using a memory foam pillow can help improve your sleep quality.The neck pillow is a user-friendly sleep aid designed to provide a healthy and comfortable sleep experience. Whether you are looking for high-quality sleep or caring for neck health, this neck pillow is your best choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this pillow. Have lot of neck problems. Feel wonderful after sleeping on this pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed to replace my cooling gel memory foam neck pillow and this was the closest pillow to it minus the bell pad layer.Since this has cooking gel foam swirled with regular memory foam I figured I’d give it a try.It’s winter time so I can’t vouch for how cooling it is. My head isn’t getting hot while sleeping. It is firm which I like. I also like that this one can be ordered in queen size vs standard size.I can’t speak for the longevity of it but as of right now, I’ve been using it almost a week and it seems pretty decent. I was having lower back pain previously when I woke up every morning and realized my previous pillow was staying flat. First night I used this I had no morning lower back pain. Second night the back pain came back next morning so flipped my mattress. Now no back pain when I awake and no headaches.For the price. It’s worth it in my opinion. Comes in a nice cover which I place in my pillow case anyways.Not too big and not to skinny. Just right. I sleep on the highest raise side and I’m a back sleeper. Hope this helps for anyone shopping around. It did take a few hours to fully decompress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have problems sleeping due to neck injury, this pillow lets me sleep all night. It arrives in a very small box but when you unfold it and let it set it becomes a normal size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: ordered for a family member....hasn't complained, so must be ok for her....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not really what I was expecting
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I don't see how this pillow has such high reviews, for one I don't know how this pillow can be considered as a queen size when it's the size of a travel pillow, second part is how firm the pillow is. It has no give to it, I can force my head into to try to get it to shape but it will reshape back to a brick and lift my head back up putting my neck at a bad angle having me wake up in the morning with a really sore neck. Honestly I think a book would be more comfortable. If you are someone who like plush feeling then stay clear from this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m obsessed, I fall asleep so fast and stay asleep. It’s so comfortable and my neck no longer hurts. It’s also giving me hallucinogenic dreams because that’s how deep I am sleeping on this pillow. I can never go back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: The picture show 2 different pieces, I though I was getting 2, I only received 1 the flat one, wanted the curve one also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024

reviews.reviewText: I am enjoying the pillow. I have multiple pillows and I use this one often.
